author: Arthur RainBot
title: Météo Strasbourg: prévisions du vendredi 2 août 2024
text: Météo Strasbourg: prévisions du vendredi 2 août 2024Météo•Toujours de la grisaille aujourd'hui. Les nuages vont stationner. On pense qu'il y aura des orages de faible intensité. Les températures seront de 23°C le matin et de 26°C l'après-midi... Arthur RainBot Aujourd'hui, Strasbourg devra encore patienter avant que les nuages ne se dissipent. Il fera environ 22°C. Une brise de nord-ouest soufflera doucement. Les nuages seront peu à peu visibles au fil de la matinée. Des orages de faible intensité atteindront la ville. L'après-midi devrait être agité avec des orages en prévision. Les températures seront comprises entre 24 et 27°C. La soirée sera marquée par des pluies éparses. Pendant votre sommeil, dans la nuit de vendredi à samedi, le ciel sera brumeux. Demain, le mercure va descendre de quelques degrés à Strasbourg. Le thermomètre affichera 21°C en moyenne. Un vent de nord-ouest rafraîchira sensiblement l'atmosphère. Le matin, des nuages parsèmeront le ciel, retardant ainsi l'arrivée du soleil. Il faudra anticiper des perturbations, les Strasbourgeois se retrouveront sous des pluies éparses. Les valeurs seront de 22°C. Demain après-midi, un beau soleil rayonnera. Les températures seront de 23°C au minimum et de 26°C au maximum. Il va faire 20°C en moyenne demain soir. Une météo mitigée est à prévoir les prochains jours. On prévoit une amélioration lundi, après une journée pluvieuse dimanche.

author: abdulkareem.aldaham
title: Gaza rescuers say 7 killed in Israeli strike on school
text:
GAZA STRIP: Civil defense rescuers in Gaza said an Israeli strike on a school-turned-shelter killed at least seven people, with the Israeli military saying it had targeted a Hamas command center.
The vast majority of the besieged Gaza Strip’s 2.4 million people have been displaced at least once by the war, sparked by the Oct. 7 attack on Israel, with many seeking shelter in school buildings.
Civil defense agency spokesman Mahmud Bassal said there were “seven martyrs, including children, and many wounded following an Israeli missile attack that targeted Al-Faluja School in Jabalia camp in north Gaza.”
The military said it carried out “precise strikes” targeting Hamas militants operating inside what it said was a command-and-control center at the Al-Faluja School.
Thursday’s attack was the latest in a series of Israeli strikes on school buildings housing displaced people in Gaza, where fighting has raged for nearly a year.
A strike on the UN-run Al-Jawni School in central Gaza on Sept. 11 drew an international outcry.
In his address to the UN General Assembly, Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas called on the international community to stop sending weapons to Israel to halt the bloodshed in the West Bank and Gaza, singling out the US.
Abbas said that Washington continued to provide diplomatic cover and weapons to Israel for its war in Gaza despite the mounting death toll there, now at 41,534 according to the Health Ministry in the Strip.
“Stop this crime. Stop it now. Stop killing children and women. Stop the genocide. Stop sending weapons to Israel. This madness cannot continue. The entire world is responsible for what is happening to our people in Gaza and the West Bank,” Abbas told the UN General Assembly.
“The US alone stood and said: ‘No, the fighting will continue.’ It did this by using the veto,” he said, referring to the veto repeatedly wielded to thwart censure in the UN Security Council of Israel’s campaign in Gaza.
“It furnished Israel with the deadly weapons that it used to kill thousands of innocent civilians, children, and women.
“This further encouraged Israel to continuous aggression,” he added, saying that Israel “does not deserve” to be in the UN.

author: Pastor Davidson Dias de Freitas
title: CRESCIMENTO E EDIFICAÇÃO – Jovens Do Senhor – Autor: Pr. Elias de Oliveira -25 de maio de 2024
text:
JOVENS DO SENHOR – 25MAI24.
Irresponsáveis, inconsequentes, vivendo segundo o mundo é a imagem que contemplamos quando olhamos para uma boa parte dos jovens que frequentam as igrejas.
Mostram através de seus atos, que são desprovidos de compromisso com o Senhor e nos passam a ideia de imunidade às leis ditadas pelo Deus Vivo; nas quais devemos pautar nosso viver.
Agem segundo os desígnios de seus corações, como se estivessem cobertos por um estatuto semelhante ao do menor (Estatuto do Menor) e, assim intocáveis pela mão do Eterno.
É fato que esta forma de vida escolhida por muitos é errada, ela procede do coração do maligno e é disseminada entre os nossos jovens. O Senhor chama-nos a atenção para uma vida de santidade. E nos alerta quanto ao pecado.
Quando o jovem é responsável espiritualmente pela sua vida?
A partir do momento em que sabem discernir entre o certo e o errado, entre fazer a vontade do Senhor ou não. E tornam-se indesculpáveis, responsáveis pelos seus atos maus e por eles, se não houver o arrependimento, hão de responder no julgamento final.
Alguns aspectos que devem ser observados pelos servos em sua juventude:
a) Viver em Santidade:
“Como pode um jovem conservar pura a sua vida? É só obedecer aos teus mandamentos.” Sl 119.9.
Isto implica em procurar viver segundo o Senhor:
- Sendo nova criatura: 2 Co 5.17
- Em oração: Lc 22.40; 1Ts 5.17; Tg 5.16
- Em Jejuns: Mt 6.16,18;
- Em Louvor: Sl 9.1; Rm 15.11
- Sendo bom: Mt 5.7
- Sendo humildes: Mt 5.3
- Honrando os pais: Ex 20.12; Pv 30.17; 6.20; Mt 15.4
b) Possuindo Autocontrole / Paciência:
“E é bom que as pessoas aprendam a sofrer com paciência desde a sua juventude.” Lm 3.27
Nesta terra seremos:
- Afligidos: Jo 16.33
- Perseguidos: Mt 5.10,11
- Difamados: 1Pe 4.4
c) Exemplo / Padrão:
“Ninguém despreze a tua mocidade; pelo contrário, para os que creem , seja exemplo na conversa, na conduta, no amor, na fé e pureza.” 1 Tm 4.12
O testemunho deve ser contínuo, santos sempre:
- Na escola / Amigos: Tt 2.12
- No falar: Tt 2.8; 3.2,9
- No trabalho: Tt 2.9,10
- No namoro: Dt 7.3,4; 2C0 6.14
- Obedientes: Tt 3.1; Dt 30.2; Pv 1.8,9; 6,20; Ef 6.1
- Vitoriosos: 1Jo 2.13,14
- Tementes a Deus: Pv 24.21
- Honrando os idosos: 1 Pe 5.5
d) Não serão isentados do pecado:
“Jovem, aproveite a sua mocidade e seja feliz enquanto é moço. Faça tudo o que quiser e siga os desejos do seu coração. Mas lembre-se de uma coisa: Deus o julgará por tudo o que você fizer.” Ec 11.9
Nestas palavras o Senhor concede plena liberdade ao jovem, ele pode fazer o que bem quiser: beber; frequentar festas; manter relações sexuais; namoros impuros; mentir; usar a Internet de forma ímpia; praticar obras da carne (Gl 5.19-21; Cl 3.5,6) etc.
Mas, faz um alerta muito sério: Será julgado por suas obras!
e) Os jovens que vivem em pecado:
“O Salário (recompensa) do pecado é a morte…” Rm 6.23
O Pecado afasta por completo o homem do Deus vivos, e suas consequências são terríveis:
- Pobre: Pv 21.17
- Sem frutos: Lc 8.14
- Presunçosos: Lc 12.19
- Mortos espiritualmente: 1 Tm 5.6
- Imundos: 2 Pe 2.13
f) Jovens Cheios do Espírito:
A Bíblia traz o relato de inúmeros jovens que foram exemplos, padrões para seus dias.
Estes foram segundo o coração do Senhor:
- Samuel: 1Sm 2.26
- Davi: 1Sm 17.33,37
- Joás: 2Cr 24.1,2
- Josias: 2 Cr 34.1-3
- Timóteo: 2 Tm 1.5; 3.15
- Jesus (era totalmente humano): Lc 2.49
g) Jovens que deram lugar ao diabo:
Há também exemplos de jovens que foram ímpio.
Estes foram contrários à vontade do Senhor e receberam em suas vidas o devido castigo:
- Caim: Gn 4.8
- Esaú: Gn 25.33,34
- Filhos de Eli: 1 Sm 2.12
- Filhos de Samuel: 1 Sm 8.3
- Absalão: 2 Sm 15.6
- Filho Pródigo: Lc 15.13
Caro Jovem, como tem sido sua vida com o Senhor?
Tens comunhão? Amizade? Intimidade?
“Eram, porém, os filhos de Eli, filhos de Belial, e não se importavam com o Senhor.” 1 Sm 2.12
Muitos têm vivido à semelhança dos filhos de Eli, desprovidos de qualquer compromisso com o Senhor, mesmo sendo membros e frequentando assiduamente a igreja, alguns até envolvidos com as sociedades internas, em ministérios diversos e visto pelos homens como “bons crentes”. Mas, são considerados pelo Senhor como imundos e o que fazem não sobe como sacrifício agradável a Deus.
“Mas o jovem Samuel crescia em estatura e no favor do Senhor e dos homens.” 1 Sm 2.26
Jovens semelhantes a Samuel são agradáveis aos olhos do Senhor. São vidas que dizem não aos apelos desta terra corrompida pelo pecado, jovens que se levantam contra as paixões imundas, os namoros impuros, e afastam-se de todas as formas de práticas contrárias à vontade do Eterno. Estes serão amados e chamados de “Jovem segundo o meu coração” pelo Senhor.
Jovens, diz o Senhor:
“Os passos do homem são dirigidos pelo Senhor; como, pois, poderá o homem entender o seu caminho?” Pv 20.24
Sejam santos e sensíveis à direção do Espírito de Deus e alcançarão a vitória.
Pr. Elias de Oliveira, AUTOR
Que Deus nos abençoe e nos proteja, hoje e sempre!
Pastor Davidson D Freitas

author: advfn.com
title: HDPE Pipes Market size is set to grow by USD 6.13 billlion from 2024-2028, Increasing demand for water supply boost the market, Technavio
text:
NEW YORK , July 4, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- The global HDPE pipes market size is estimated to grow by USD 6 .13 billion from 2024-2028, according to Technavio. The market is estimated to grow at a CAGR of 5.4% during the forecast period. Increasing demand for water supply is driving market growth, with a trend towards mechanical coupling in HDPE pipes. However, significant prevalence of substitutes poses a challenge. Key market players include Advanced Drainage Systems Inc., APL Apollo TUBES Ltd., Astral Ltd., Atkore Inc, Chevron Corp., Formosa Plastics Corp., Genuit Group Plc, Georg Fischer Ltd., Hexatronic Group AB, JM Eagle Inc, Lane Enterprises Inc., LyondellBasell Industries N.V., Orbia Advance Corp. S.A.B. De C.V., POLYPLASTIC Group, Prinsco Inc., PTT Public Co. Ltd., Qenos Pty Ltd., Unidelta Spa, Uponor Corp., and Wavin BV.

S.A.B. De C.V., POLYPLASTIC Group, Prinsco Inc., PTT Public Co. Ltd., Qenos Pty Ltd., Unidelta Spa, Uponor Corp., and Wavin BV
Market Driver
HDPE pipes are extensively utilized in key industries like mining and construction, surpassing traditional concrete and steel pipes due to their distinctive properties and innovations. Joining HDPE pipes typically involves butt fusion and electrofusion techniques, which apply heat and pressure to the pipe ends to create a seal. However, these methods can be time-consuming, leading to project delays, and are costly due to the need for certified crews and expensive fusion equipment. To address these challenges, Victaulic Company introduced mechanical pipe joining systems using grooved and plain-end mechanical couplings for HDPE pipes. This technology significantly reduces project completion time, eliminates the need for additional valves, and lowers inventory costs. Weather conditions, such as moisture, snow, rain, or condensation, can impact fusion techniques by increasing heating time and creating ambiguity in joint integrity. In contrast, mechanical couplings offer weather-independent, quick, and easy installations, making them increasingly popular in the HDPE piping system market. This trend is anticipated to fuel market growth during the forecast period.
The HDPE pipes market is experiencing significant growth in various industries. In oil and gas, HDPE pipes are widely used in crude oil transport, refineries, and processing plants for refined products like gasoline. Modern farming practices also utilize HDPE for water sourcing and plumbing systems. Construction sectors, including luxury apartments and sewage systems, benefit from HDPE's resistance to chemicals, abrasion, and temperature tolerance. In gas distribution networks, lightweight and eco-friendly HDPE pipes reduce carbon footprint and are flexible for installation in challenging environments. HDPE's reliability in transporting natural gas and petroleum distribution makes it a preferred choice over traditional materials. Jet Polymer Recycling and use of recycled materials further contribute to environmental awareness. HDPE, a thermoplastic polymer, offers resistance to chemical corrosion, weathering, and reliability in demanding conditions.
Research report provides comprehensive data on impact of trend. For more details- Download a Sample Report
Market Challenges
The HDPE pipe market has experienced significant shifts in the pipeline industry due to the introduction of high-performance plastic pipes as an alternative to metallic pipes. HDPE pipes are favored by industries such as construction, irrigation, and chemicals due to their superior technical capabilities compared to PVC pipes. However, HDPE pipes come with a higher price tag, approximately double the cost of rubber ring-jointed PVC pipes. In the irrigation sector, HDPE pipes with electrofusion joints are commonly used for hardscape applications, while PVC pipes are preferred for softscape projects due to their cost-effectiveness. Energy efficiency is another factor influencing the choice of pipes, with PVC pipes requiring less energy to produce and having a smaller carbon footprint than HDPE pipes. Currently, around 65% of water supply pipes in the US are made of PVC, resulting in substantial cost savings of USD35 - USD37 billion over the past century. Flexibility is another area where PVC and polypropylene pipes outperform HDPE pipes, as HDPE pipes have poor ultraviolet resistance and lower stiffness. These factors pose a significant threat to the growth of the HDPE pipe market, as substitutes may be preferred in certain applications. The HDPE (High-Density Polyethylene) pipes market is witnessing significant growth due to the increasing demand for durable and corrosion-resistant piping solutions in various industries. In the agricultural sector, HDPE pipes are increasingly being used for irrigation systems due to their flexibility and resistance to chemicals and UV light. In the water supply sector, HDPE pipes offer advantages such as high strength, lightweight properties, and resistance to external pressure, making them ideal for transportation networks and water distribution systems. In the automotive industry, HDPE pipes are used for fuel tanks, automotive components like bumpers, and interior parts due to their lightweight properties and resistance to chemicals and emissions. However, challenges such as water scarcity, water wastage, and increasing regulations on emission and vehicle weight are driving the demand for HDPE pipes in the water supply and automotive industries. Additionally, the mining sector is adopting HDPE pipes for mining exploration and extraction activities due to their durability and resistance to corrosion. HDPE resin is used to manufacture PE 100 HDPE pipes, which can withstand internal and external pressure and transport fluids like water, wastewater, and chemicals without damage. Overall, HDPE pipes offer sustainable and cost-effective solutions for various industries, making them a preferred choice for piping systems in water supply, agriculture, automotive, and mining sectors. For more insights on driver and challenges - Request a sample report!
Segment Overview
This hdpe pipes market report extensively covers market segmentation by
Application 1.1 Water supply 1.2 Agricultural irrigation 1.3 Sewage system 1.4 Oil and gas 1.5 Others Type 2.1 PE 100 2.2 PE 80 2.3 PE 63 Geography 3.1 APAC 3.2 North America 3.3 Europe 3.4 Middle East and Africa 3.5 South America
1.1 Water supply- The global water supply market is experiencing growth due to the increasing demand for water caused by population growth and changing consumption patterns. Approximately 1% more water is required annually for various sectors, including industry, energy, domestic use, and infrastructure. Irrigation accounts for the largest water consumption at 65%-70%. HDPE pipes, such as PE80, PE100, and PE100-RC, are commonly used for water supply systems due to their durability, strain and corrosion resistance, and non-toxic composition. These pipes can last over 50 years and do not affect water taste or odor. HDPE pipes' unique features include resistance to high-pressure points, resistance to fissure spread, rapid temperature expansion or contraction, ease of transport, handling, and assembly, and standardized fabrication. The rise in urbanization and infrastructure development is expected to fuel the global HDPE pipe market's growth in water supply systems during the forecast period.
For more information on market segmentation with geographical analysis including forecast (2024-2028) and historic data (2017-2021) - Download a Sample Report
Research Analysis
High density polyethylene (HDPE) pipes, made from thermoplastic polymer, offer superior reliability and flexibility in various industries. HDPE pipes resist chemical corrosion, making them ideal for natural gas and petroleum distribution. In agriculture, they ensure water supply to farmlands without contamination from pesticides. Their resistance to abrasion and weathering makes them suitable for transportation of natural gas and water. HDPE pipes are also used in automotive components such as fuel tanks and bumpers due to their lightweight and high fuel efficiency. However, installation can be a challenge in shifting soil conditions, requiring specific fittings and joints. HDPE pipes contribute to reducing plastic pollution as they have a long lifespan and are easily recyclable. Despite their advantages, HDPE pipes face competition from metal pipes in certain applications due to emission regulations and vehicle weight concerns.
Market Research Overview
High density polyethylene (HDPE) pipes are made from a thermoplastic polymer known for their reliability in challenging environments. These pipes offer superior corrosion resistance, making them ideal for transporting natural gas, petroleum, and other fluids in industries prone to chemical corrosion. HDPE pipes are flexible, allowing for easy installation in various terrains, including those with shifting soil. They are also resistant to weathering, abrasion, and temperature fluctuations. HDPE pipes are used extensively in sectors like agriculture for irrigation, in water supply systems for potable water and wastewater, and in the mining sector for mining exploration and extraction activities. Their lightweight properties make them a preferred choice for transportation networks, reducing the carbon footprint. HDPE pipes are also used in modern farming practices for water supply and in plumbing systems for luxury apartments and sewage systems. HDPE pipes come in various grades like PE 100 HDPE, and their resistance to chemicals, abrasion, and temperature makes them suitable for use in refineries, processing plants, and refined products like gasoline. HDPE resin is also used in automotive components such as bumpers and fuel tanks due to its high strength and resistance to impact damage. The increasing focus on emission regulations and vehicle weight reduction in the automotive industry has led to an increased demand for HDPE pipes in automotive applications. HDPE pipes are also recyclable, making them an eco-friendly option for various industries. Overall, HDPE pipes offer durable piping solutions that are flexible, lightweight, and resistant to various external factors, making them a preferred choice for various applications.

author: Faithwire
title: Gobierno chino toma medidas enérgicas contra la principal aplicación de oración cristiana y prohíbe su descarga
text:
Gobierno chino toma medidas enérgicas contra la principal aplicación de oración cristiana y prohíbe su descarga
Foto de Jenny Smith/Unsplash
En China, la Biblia no está segura. De hecho, incluso las aplicaciones cristianas están en el punto de mira.
La última aplicación que se enfrenta al escrutinio es Pray.com, una plataforma llena de contenido basado en la fe, planes diarios de lectura de la Biblia y programas de desarrollo espiritual. Según
un comunicado de prensa emitido esta semana, la aplicación ha sido retirada de la App Store de Apple en China continental.
Su eliminación de la App Store en el país comunista entra en el ámbito de las "Medidas para la Administración de los Servicios de Información Religiosa en Internet" de China, que entraron en vigor en marzo de 2022.
Según
la Comisión Ejecutiva del Congreso sobre China, una agencia independiente del gobierno de Estados Unidos que supervisa los derechos humanos en China, las restricciones establecidas en 2022 exigen un permiso emitido por el gobierno para publicar contenido religioso y prohíben rotundamente la retransmisión en línea de ceremonias religiosas, eventos y servicios de culto.
La eliminación de la aplicación Pray.com se produce antes del Día Nacional de Oración, el 2 de mayo.
"Desde que iniciamos Pray.com, nos hemos acostumbrado a las relaciones positivas con China", dijo el cofundador Michael Lynn. "El presidente Xi [Jinping] ha permitido la impresión de casi 150 millones de Biblias al año, y el [ex] presidente [Donald] Trump se aseguró de que las Biblias estuvieran exentas de los aranceles chinos".
Steve Gatena, fundador y CEO de Pray.com, dijo en el comunicado de prensa que él y su equipo están "explorando vías alternativas para entregar nuestro contenido y servicios a las personas en China continental".
"Mientras trabajamos en una solución", dijo, "quiero extender personalmente una invitación al presidente Xi Jinping para que se una a nosotros en el evento del Día Nacional de la Oración de este año en Washington, D.C."
CBN News se ha puesto en contacto con Pray.com y actualizará esta historia con cualquier declaración del ministerio.
El gobierno chino no es ajeno a la censura.
Bajo el régimen de Xi, el Partido Comunista Chino está incluso, según los informes,
reescribiendo las Escrituras y llamando a Jesús "pecador".
Según La Voz de los Mártires, un organismo de control que monitorea la persecución cristiana en todo el mundo, el PCCh anunció en 2019 que comenzaría el proceso de "actualizar la Biblia para mantenerse al día".
"Las revisiones incluirán agregar 'valores socialistas fundamentales' y la eliminación de pasajes que no reflejan las creencias comunistas", dijo VOM. "En un libro de texto para estudiantes de secundaria publicado en septiembre de 2020, los autores incluyeron un pasaje de Juan 8, revisado en su nueva versión".
El año pasado,
como informó CBN News, los funcionarios chinos están probando una aplicación que requeriría que los ciudadanos se registren previamente antes de asistir a los servicios religiosos.
"Esta primavera, en la provincia de Henan, pusieron en marcha una aplicación para obtener la aprobación para ir a cualquier tipo de servicio religioso", dijo Todd Nettleton de VOM. "Lo que eso significa es que necesitas tener la aplicación en tu teléfono".
"Tienes que registrarte previamente para ir a una reunión religiosa, dar al gobierno chino toda tu información, decirles quién eres, dónde vives, tu información de identificación, etc.", añadió.
Puede leer más al respecto
aquí.
